p.s: The given scene shows the encounteencounter between Maverick and the police at the Dinerdiner.
The main Purposepurpose of the scene is Starr's character development.
The scene shows how well Starr learned from Khalil's death and that she knows what she has to do in such situations.
To show this purpose the director uses a static camera angle on Starr to show every movement she is doing and saying.
To make it clear he shows the actions of the family with many cuts because they weren't in a situation like Starr and they don't know what is the right thing to do.
Another purposopurpose is the pressure that lies on the family from the police and the gangs.
To show that the director decides to do many hectic cuts of the encounter between Maverick and the gang.
To make it clear that there is a constant pressure on the family the police comes in right after the gang members leave.
To sum everything up, the most important purposes are the character development of Starr, and the constant pressure that is on the family.
